content:
**size ** approximately 15 inches 38 1 cm in diameter
**materials ** * crochet cotton size 30 white 3 balls * tatting cotton size 70 blue 2 balls * scraps of green pearl cotton * yellow stamens * steel hooks size 10 and size 14 originally published 1949 size 30 refers to small ball j &p coats six-cord mercerized crochet no yardage given
